result.pre: For infections and blood collections, mice were anesthetized using either
result.post: inhalation or a ketamine/xylazine (10 and 1 mg/ml, respectively)

result.pre: TakahashiS, TazumaS, et al.Evolution of hepatitis C virus quasispecies during
result.post: and interferon-alpha-2b combination therapy and interferon-alpha-2b monotherapy. Intervirology. 2006;49:
